description: This cocktail is perfect for sipping on in the evening when you want something low in alcohol content but still flavorful and delicious. This Amalfi Martini recipe pairs well with&nbsp;gin because the faint earthy note offsets the lemon flavor in limoncello. But if you prefer, you can still substitute vodka for the gin in this recipe.
